newsitem.title: HONG KONG: First Pac unit to invest HK$1.5bln in PCS.
newsitem.headline: First Pac unit to invest HK$1.5bln in PCS.

text.p: First Pacific Co Ltd's Hong Kong telecommunications unit Pacific Link Communications Ltd said on Monday it would invest HK$1 billion to HK$1.5 billion in its Personal Communications Services (PCS) in the territory.

Pacific Link expected to start its PCS mobile phone network in mid-1997 and to recover the investment within four years of operation, Stephen Ngan, general manager in marketing and sales at Pacific Link, said by telephone.
The group expected to have at least 30,000 to 40,000 PCS subscribers in the first half-year of operation, he added.
Its PCS investment would affect the unit's earnings in the first half of 1997, but the impact would be alleviated after the launch of service which would generate income, he said.
